bibl.title: Three Unpublished Greek Documents in Cairo Collection.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. SR 3049 (227). A list of landowners. Theadelphia, 2nd or 3rd cent. AD. - 2. Inv. SR 3049 (116). A business letter. Theadelphia, 3rd or 4th c. AD. - 3. Inv. SR 3733. An account of wine. Fayûm, VI/VII AD.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: HANAFI Alia, Three Unpublished Greek Documents in Cairo Collection.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 407-425 et pll. XV-XVI.

1. Inv. SR 3049 (227). A list of landowners. Theadelphia, 2nd or 3rd cent. AD. - 2. Inv. SR 3049 (116). A business letter. Theadelphia, 3rd or 4th c. AD. - 3. Inv. SR 3733. An account of wine. Fayûm, VI/VII AD.
